functions.name: Tan
functions.description: Computes the tangent of a number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to compute the tangent for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a number.

functions.name: TanTable
functions.description: Computes the tangent of each number in a table.

parameters.name: E
parameters.description: The table of numbers to compute the tangent for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a table.
